Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Angelman syndrome ( AS ) is caused by chromosome 15q11 - q13 deletions of maternal origin , by paternal uniparental disomy ( UPD ) 15 , by imprinting defects , and by mutations in the UBE3A gene .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| Angelman syndrome (AS) |
| Chromosome 15q11-q13 deletions |
| Paternal uniparental disomy (UPD) 15 |
| Imprinting defects |
| Mutations in the UBE3A gene |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| Angelman syndrome (AS) |

The other entities in the paragraph do not clearly refer to "Disease", so they have been removed from the table:

* Chromosome 15q11-q13 deletions
* Paternal uniparental disomy (UPD) 15
* Imprinting defects
* Mutations in the UBE3A gene
